import typography from"assets/theme/base/typography";import borders from"assets/theme/base/borders";import colors from"assets/theme/base/colors";// Material Kit 2 React helper functions
import pxToRem from"assets/theme/functions/pxToRem";const{size}=typography;const{text}=colors;const{borderWidth,borderColor}=borders;export default{styleOverrides:{root:{padding:pxToRem(16),fontSize:size.md,color:text.main},dividers:{borderTop:"".concat(borderWidth[1]," solid ").concat(borderColor),borderBottom:"".concat(borderWidth[1]," solid ").concat(borderColor)}}};
